title: Key of Min Value | Challenge
description: In Python, dictionaries are a useful data structure for storing key-value pairs. Sometimes, we may need to find the key of the minimum value in a dictionary. In this challenge, you will be tasked with writing a function that finds the key of the minimum value in a given dictionary.

meta.title: Python Dictionary | Key of Minimum Value
meta.description: Learn how to find the key of the minimum value in a Python dictionary. Improve your coding skills with this concise programming tutorial.
meta.keywords: Python, Dictionary, Key, Minimum Value, Programming, Tutorial

i18n.title: 最小值的键 | 挑战
i18n.description: 在Python中，字典是用于存储键值对的有用数据结构。有时，我们可能需要找到字典中最小值的键。在这个挑战中，你将负责编写一个函数，该函数能在给定字典中找到最小值的键。

meta.title: Python字典 | 最小值的键
meta.description: 学习如何在Python字典中找到最小值的键。通过这个简洁的编程教程提升你的编码技能。
